creator: dan_gulotta@yahoo.com
text: org.apache.tools.ant.DemuxInputStream.read() should return values in the range -1..255.  Instead it returns values in the range -128..127.

creator: jkf@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report, fixed in revision 943929

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=943929&view=rev
